Description.Text: Rooms with direct dial telephone,refrigerator,private bathroom (with shower), A/C (extra upon demand), Safe Box (extra upon demand). All rooms have a large balcony.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: The hotel is situated in the famous area of Agia Marina of Chania, Crete - only meters away from the fabulous crystal clear beach of Agia Marina.The distance from the city center of Chania is about 8 kilometers and there is immediate access to any kind of desired transportation - bus or taxi.
